USDA Food Insecurity

Representativeness disclaimer

These analyses are based on responses collected from 1552 caregivers between the dates of August 11, 2020 and August 27, 2020. These caregivers represent a range of voices: 8.83% are Black/African American, 16.43% are LatinX, and 21.59% live at or below 1.5 times the federal poverty line. Proportions/percentages are calculated based on the item-level response rates, not out of the total sample size. The data for these analyses are not weighted.
